name: Larry The Worm
description:
Made as part of the Global Game Jam 2020. 

The Theme was "Repair" and so this game features a worm which can divide itself and grow back up to full size

The game is designed to work with an Xbox controller and features all assets as stop motion drawings and objects captured during the jam along with original composed audio.

https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/larry-worm-3 

Credits

Sound - Paul Robins

Art - Oana Lazar

Programming - Bill Cao, Lewis Cleminson
